snippet.title: HOLYHUNT - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY NOW: 
STEAM - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2331920/HOLYHUNT/
NINTENDO - https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/holyhunt-switch/?srsltid=AfmBOoqV7eLJirczi5Aji6tm2qZupBaEF6v3e4-rkOo_aN5Xn48BZf6n
NINTENDO EU - https://www.nintendo.com/en-gb/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/HOLYHUNT-2430806.html?srsltid=AfmBOopKvvmtvtzen-5ZPOpejsXQV94zhwD3SiA3zVOkUkn9K6WJnQkk

HOLYHUNT is a roguelike dual-stick shooter game that unites the nostalgic 8-bit aesthetic with modern action-oriented hardcore shooting mechanics.

Make your way into the church hall to shoot and dash through different species of demons and bosses with unique mechanics that keep challenging your abilities each run.
 
Buy improvements and different bullets suited to exploit your enemies weaknesses and receive blessings from angels as you keep fighting to get even stronger. Trust in your faith and keep shooting to save the world from the doomsday prophecy.

HOLYHUNT is a roguelike dual-stick shooter game that unites the nostalgic 8-bit aesthetic with modern action-oriented hardcore shooting mechanics.

Make your way into the church hall to shoot and dash through different species of demons and bosses with unique mechanics that keep challenging your abilities each run.
